title: VA - Virtually Surrounded (Headphone Demo FLAC) ADHDerby [WWRG]
description:
Various Artists - Virtually Surrounded (Headphone Demo FLAC) ADHDerby [WWRG]

Genres: Various
Styles: Very Various
Sources: DVD, DVDA, SACD, Blu-Ray (5.1 7.1)
Converter: BlasterX Acoustic Engine Pro
Resampler: Adobe Audition
Sample rate: 44100 Hz
Bits per sample: 16
Codec: FLAC

This release contains diverse genres and styles, from Rock to Electronic, all by different artists.
The tracks are selected for their brilliance and clarity, dynamic range, detail, soundstages, immersiveness, bass rolls and brontides.
20 tracks to give your headphones a proper workout.

All tracks contain virtual surround sound. Virtual Surround is a technology which allows you to listen to music, watch movies, or play video games with surround effects using any set of two channel stereo headphones. The sources of this release are surround versions of the tracks ripped from DVD's, DVDA's, SACD's and Blu-Ray's. I've converted them to virtual surround with Creative's BlasterX Acoustic Engine Pro. In my opinion it does a much better job than Dolby Headphone or DTS Headphone:X and with almost no impact on the original audio quality. Using state-of-the-art technology, it gives an enhanced virtual 7.1 channel surround sound experience with regular stereo headphones.
